statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE mentor_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE supervisor_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE participant_id = 1 AND mentor_id = 2 AND supervisor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE participant_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback_data WHERE mentor_id = 200;
SELECT DISTINCT mentor_id, supervisor_id FROM feedback_data;
SELECT participant_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT mentor_id, feedback FROM mentors_feedback;
SELECT * FROM mentors_feedback ORDER BY mentor_id DESC;
SELECT feedback FROM mentors_feedback WHERE mentor_id = 1;
SELECT feedback FROM mentors_feedback WHERE mentor_id = 2;
SELECT mentor_id, feedback FROM mentors_feedback WHERE mentor_id = 3;
SELECT mentor_id, feedback FROM mentors_feedback WHERE mentor_id = 1;
SELECT feedback, mentor_id FROM mentors_feedback WHERE mentor_id = 10;
SELECT feedback FROM mentors_feedback ORDER BY mentor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supervisors_feedback WHERE supervisor_id = 5;
SELECT supervisor_id, feedback FROM supervisors_feedback ORDER BY supervisor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_mechanisms;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_mechanisms WHERE supervisor_id = 3;
SELECT name, profession FROM mentors WHERE profession = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT id, name, department FROM supervisors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT mentor_id, supervisor_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_mechanisms WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM feedback_mechanisms LIMIT 5;
SELECT mentor_id, supervisor_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_mechanisms WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY feedback_text DESC;

SELECT mentors.name, supervisors.department, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_mechanisms INNER JOIN mentors ON mentors.id = feedback_mechanisms.mentor_id INNER JOIN supervisors ON supervisors.id = feedback_mechanisms.supervisor_id;

SELECT mentors.name AS mentor_name, supervisors.name AS supervisor_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_mechanisms INNER JOIN mentors ON mentors.id = feedback_mechanisms.mentor_id INNER JOIN supervisors ON supervisors.id = feedback_mechanisms.supervisor_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;

SELECT mentors.name AS mentor_name, supervisors.name AS supervisor_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_mechanisms INNER JOIN mentors ON mentors.id = feedback_mechanisms.mentor_id INNER JOIN supervisors ON supervisors.id = feedback_mechanisms.supervisor_id WHERE mentors.profession = 'Engineer' AND supervisors.department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM mentors_feedback;
SELECT mentor_name, department FROM mentors WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT supervisor_name, supervisor_email FROM supervisors ORDER BY supervisor_name ASC;
SELECT mentor_name, feedback_text FROM mentors_feedback WHERE mentor_id = 1;
SELECT mentor_name, department, hire_date FROM mentors WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM mentors_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT mentor_name, department FROM mentors WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT supervisor_name, department FROM supervisors ORDER BY supervisor_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM mentors_feedback WHERE supervisor_id = 3 AND rating > 3;
SELECT mentor_name, supervisor_name, category FROM mentors m INNER JOIN feedback_tracking f ON m.id = f.mentor_id WHERE f.rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email FROM mentors;
SELECT supervisor_name, supervisor_email FROM supervisors ORDER BY supervisor_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE mentor_id = 2;
SELECT mentor_id, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM mentor_ratings GROUP BY mentor_id;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email FROM mentors ORDER BY mentor_name DESC;
SELECT supervisor_name, supervisor_email FROM supervisors WHERE supervisor_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE mentor_id = 2 AND supervisor_id = 4;
SELECT MAX(rating_value) AS highest_rating FROM mentor_ratings;
